12.content:
Thinking he dropped it, John quickly searches the ground around him, but notices the concerned look on your face and stops.

"You didn't drop it, it went inside you."

"Gosh! I don't feel anything, though. What do you suppose is going on?" John says. His tone of voice completely floors you.

"You sure you don't feel any different? Why are you talking like that?"

"I can't for the life of me--holy cow, you're right! I'm speaking like Miss Lock!" John exclaims, and puts his hands over his mouth, eyes wide with fascination.

"Maybe the orb is her voice or personality or something. I'm going to try to get it out," you say, but aren't sure exactly how to do it. You touch his arm tentatively, and you can feel a sensation run through your own arm. In moments, a glow appears and you take out an orb from his arm.

John appears unharmed, but whose orb is it?

"Gosh, that is so odd! I didn't feel anything while it was in me or you were removing it, but now I feel so...odd!"

"You're still talking like Miss Lock. This orb is yours!" you say, and toss it at John, thinking it'll go back into him again.

John ducks, not expecting you to toss the orb, and it falls near the feet of Marissa Goldmoore, who John's been obsessed with for some time, though he's never approached her yet. She's quite pretty, very gentle, and wickedly smart, very unlike John. Her friends are standing around her, but she's the only one who noticed the orb.

She reaches down and tries to pick it up, but it appears to vanish when she touches it. You realize this is about to get very complicated.

"What on Earth have you done?!" John demands, seeing what's happened. You don't know if it's Miss Lock's personality or John's panicked state, but his voice sounds higher than it should.

What do you do now?

"Stop panicking! I'll just take it out of her like I took it out of you, ok?"

"Please, just hurry!" John pleads.

You walk up to Marissa and say "Hello!", holding your hand out so that you can get the orb when she shakes it.

"And who the hell are you?" she says, catching you off guard. Her friends also look surprised.

"I'm John's friend...uh...can I shake your hand?"

"No way! What are you, a fan?"

Frustrated, you grab Marissa's hand and shake it vigorously. You feel an orb in your hand and quickly pull it away with your hand, concealing it behind you. Marissa recoils with an angry look on her face.

"What the hell is wrong with you? I'm outta here!" she says, motioning for her friends to follow her. Not understanding what's going on, they follow her with confused expressions on their faces.

You look at John meekly and see his severe expression and his hands on his hips, just like Miss Lock when she was really angry.

"I'm very disappointed."

You feel a bit disappointed too, especially when you realize you're no longer holding the orb you got from Marissa!
